metadata.title: Features
metadata.description: Explore all the powerful features that make our platform unique.

content.heading: Simple,
content.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include a 14-day free trial.
content.trialNotice: 14-day free trial on all paid plans. No credit card required.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: Perfect for individuals and small projects.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For large organizations with custom needs.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate your billing.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes! All paid plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

faqs.question: What happens when my trial ends?
faqs.answer: At the end of your trial, you can choose to subscribe to a paid plan or continue with our free Starter plan.

metadata.title: Pricing
metadata.description: Simple, transparent pricing for teams of all sizes.

content.heading: Get in
content.description: Have a question or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.
content.emailDescription: Drop us a line anytime. We typically respond within 24 hours.
content.responseDescription: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days.
content.locationDescription: We're a global team working remotely.
content.quoteText: Building the future, one step at a time.
content.successMessage: Thank you for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.

metadata.title: Contact
metadata.description: Get in touch with our team.

content.heading: Privacy
content.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
content.summaryContent: We respect your privacy and only collect data necessary to provide our services. We never sell your data.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.

content.footerText: This policy is part of our

metadata.title: Privacy Policy
metadata.description: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

content.heading: Terms of
content.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
content.summaryContent: Use our services responsibly. We provide them as-is and reserve the right to modify or terminate them.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

sections.title: Use of Services
sections.content: You may use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use our services in any way that violates any applicable law or regulation.

sections.title: User Accounts
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: The content, features, and functionality of our services are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.

content.footerText: This policy is part of our

metadata.title: Terms of Service
metadata.description: Terms and conditions for using our services.

content.heading: Cookie
content.description: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies.
content.summaryContent: We use essential cookies to make our site work and analytics cookies to understand how you use it. You can control your preferences.

sections.title: What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember your preferences and improve your experience.

sections.title: How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to keep you signed in, remember your preferences, understand how you use our site, and improve our services.

sections.title: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content:
Essential cookies: Required for the site to function properly.
Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site.
Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences.

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect your experience on our site.

content.footerText: This policy is part of our

metadata.title: Cookie Policy
metadata.description: Information about how we use cookies on our website.

content.heading: How can we
content.subheading: Find answers to common questions or reach out to our support team.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Sign up for a free account and follow our getting started guide in the documentation.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time from your account settings. Changes take effect immediately.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team through the contact page or email us directly at support@example.com.
